title: Pavane for a Dead Girl Volume 1
description: It is near the end of the Meiji Era in Japan. Nanao Kaga defies her father's opposition and attends a music academy in Tokyo in search for "Prince of Harmony", the man of her dreams. Meanwhile, Takenomaru Sagami is a violin prodigy on a quest - he looks for Tears of Maria as part of the contract with the Great Angel. When Nanao meets Takenomaru, will Nanao's dream finally come true?
author: Koge-Donbo*
